S02E08.name: Man City
S02E08.overview: Ted and Dr. Sharon realize they might have to meet each other halfway. Tensions are high as the team prepares for the semifinal.

S02E09.name: Beard After Hours
S02E09.overview: After the semifinal, Beard sets out on an all-night odyssey through London in an effort to collect his thoughts.

S01E05.name: Tan Lines
S01E05.overview: With his wife and son visiting from America, Ted makes drastic changes to the lineup during a critical match.

S03E01.name: Smells Like Mean Spirit
S03E01.overview: The newly promoted AFC Richmond face mockery as pundits predict they’ll finish dead last this season.

S01E10.name: The Hope That Kills You
S01E10.overview: Richmond plays a climactic match that will determine the fates of Ted and his club.

S01E04.name: For the Children
S01E04.overview: Rebecca hosts the team’s annual charity benefit, where Ted stages a reconciliation between Roy and Jamie.

S01E06.name: Two Aces
S01E06.overview: When Jamie refuses to train, Ted turns to talented new signing Dani Rojas—and the team is struck by an age-old curse.

S03E03.overview: Richmond adjust to an exciting change, but Jamie has reservations. Ted learns there’s something new going on back in Kansas as well.

S03E02.name: (I Don't Want to Go to) Chelsea
S03E02.overview: News of a top player looking to move to London sends the English clubs into a frenzy. Richmond play their first game back in the Premier League.

S01E07.name: Make Rebecca Great Again
S01E07.overview: Rebecca celebrates her first anniversary as a divorcée as the team plays a match in Liverpool.

S01E03.name: Trent Crimm: The Independent
S01E03.overview: To arrange an in-depth exposé, Rebecca pairs cynical journalist Trent Crimm with Ted for a day. Ted and Roy venture into the community.

S03E12.name: So Long, Farewell
S03E12.overview: AFC Richmond play their final game of the season.

S03E06.name: Sunflowers
S03E06.overview: A friendly match takes the team to Amsterdam, where one night out unlocks truths for many.

S03E07.name: The Strings That Bind Us
S03E07.overview: The Greyhounds try a new strategy that has everyone thinking outside the box. Sam prepares to host a VIP guest at Ola’s.

S01E02.name: Biscuits
S01E02.overview: It’s Ted’s first day of coaching, and fans aren’t happy. He makes little headway but remains undeterred as the team plays its first match.

S03E05.name: Signs
S03E05.overview: With their season in a tailspin, Richmond try to right the ship against mighty Manchester City. Off the pitch, everyone faces their own setbacks.

S03E11.name: Mom City
S03E11.overview: An unexpected guest has Ted on edge. When Richmond travel to Manchester for a big match, Roy and Keeley become concerned about Jamie.

S03E10.name: International Break
S03E10.overview: While some of the Greyhounds head home to play for their countries in international matches, Edwin Akufo brings a business proposal to Rebecca.

S03E04.name: Big Week
S03E04.overview: Everyone’s feeling the pressure as Richmond gear up to play West Ham. Ted is reunited with an old friend.

S01E01.name: Pilot
S01E01.overview: American football coach Ted Lasso is hired by a wealthy divorcée to coach the English soccer team AFC Richmond.

S03E09.name: La Locker Room Aux Folles
S03E09.overview: Colin and Isaac’s friendship is tested. Roy is asked to do a press conference.

S03E08.name: We'll Never Have Paris
S03E08.overview: While watching Henry, Ted fights the urge to spiral when Michelle and Dr. Jacob go on a romantic trip. An online leak has massive implications for Keeley.

S01E09.name: All Apologies
S01E09.overview: After a series of mistakes on the pitch, pressure mounts to bench Roy. Rebecca finally reveals the truth to Ted.

S01E08.name: The Diamond Dogs
S01E08.overview: Ted and Roy are both having relationship problems. Ted consults the Diamond Dogs while Roy lays it on the line with Keeley.

S02E02.name: Lavender
S02E02.overview: Ted is surprised by the reappearance of a familiar face. Roy tries out a new gig.

S02E03.name: Do the Right-est Thing
S02E03.overview: Rebecca has a special visitor shadow her at work. A player’s return is not welcomed by the team.

S02E01.name: Goodbye Earl
S02E01.overview: AFC Richmond brings in a sports psychologist to help the team overcome their unprecedented seven game tie-streak.

S02E04.name: Carol of the Bells
S02E04.overview: It’s Christmas in Richmond. Rebecca enlists Ted for a secret mission, Roy and Keeley search for a miracle, and the Higginses open up their home.

S02E10.name: No Weddings and a Funeral
S02E10.overview: Rebecca is stunned by a sudden loss. The team rallies to show their support, but Ted finds himself grappling with a piece of his past.

S02E11.name: Midnight Train to Royston
S02E11.overview: A billionaire football enthusiast from Ghana makes Sam an unbelievable offer. Ted plans something special for Dr. Sharon’s last day with the team.

S02E05.name: Rainbow
S02E05.overview: Nate learns how to be assertive from Keeley and Rebecca. Ted asks Roy for a favor.

S02E07.name: Headspace
S02E07.overview: With things turning around for Richmond, it’s time for everyone to work on their issues—like Ted’s discomfort, Nate’s confidence, and Roy’s attention.

S02E06.name: The Signal
S02E06.overview: Ted is fired up that the new team dynamic seems to be working. But will they have a chance in the quarterfinal?

S02E12.name: Inverting the Pyramid of Success
S02E12.overview: Richmond gets their final chance to win promotion as Ted deals with the fallout of Trent Crimm’s painfully honest exposé. Season finale.
